data.actual_result: Freeze requireing Task Manager shutdown of Canary
data.short_description: Freeze while fullscreening a YT video
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Google Emoji (If you have acess, it's currently closed) - go to #invites - Click on the Video Puzzle and skip to some place far in the video - press 'f' to go full screen  - Notes: I have tried sending my alt (first) a 10 hour video and the origial content, unable to repro on both this account and alt, it only occurs in #invites
